channel.title: Rework for the Courtwizard
channel.description:
Court Wizard (Blue Dragon Support)
Day ability 1-Blessing-Prevents one bad effect on someone(Does not block conversions OR Death. Blocks Frames, Occupy, Redirection ETC) (2 uses)
Day ability 2-Empower-Gives the user a 1 shot CS (kills them if they try to kill a BD) (1 use)
Night ability 1-Recharge-Give the class a extra use of there limited abilities if they are a member of the BD (Does not tell you if this Succeeded) (2 uses) Night ability 2-Magical barrier

item.title: Rework for the Courtwizard
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
What if we buff Magic Barrier so it tells you specifically what effect it prevented? This would give Court Wizard investigative powers and make him funner to play. It would tell you whether you blocked:

  • Occupy
  • Debauch
  • Happy Hour
  • Conversion
  • Court Wizard or Ritualist swap
  • Invoker target change

item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Firelitten:

Night ability 1-Protection rune-Make it so no one can visit the target(2-3 uses depending on if it is OP)

This is basically wall of fire, but without the assasin getting in. Probs make this 2 uses

Firelitten:

Day ability 2-Blessing-Prevents one bad effect on someone(Does not block conversions OR Death. Blocks Frames, Occupy, Redirection ETC) (2 uses)

This is good.

Firelitten:

Day ability 1-Curse-Choose a target, They will get the message that they were poisoned by a assassin. They will die in 1 night if not healed. (1 use)

I do not know if this is needed. As I say it’s a support class not killer nor offensive.

Firelitten:

Day ability 2-I need help with this staff-Choose a person. That player will be occupied the next night. (1-2 uses depending on peoples reaction)

Sage is a support class not offensive, so I would change or take out this day ability. Unless you change sage to an offensive class.

Firelitten:

Day ability 1-Mind Shield-Prevents 1 Conversion attempt against this person(1 use) (Notifies ONLY YOU that someone attempted to convert them)To pretty much make sure that a confirmed person isn’t converted.

Is this like debt that it lasts forever or it only works for that night?

item.title: Rework for the Courtwizard
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
The real problem is with peoples mindset. If someone can’t notice them having any positive effect on the game, They won’t like that. And you can’t really see any positive effects from this. Lets face it You stopped a conversion WOHOHO. you didn’t even know you did. Knight Kills people. Drunk can find attackers, Physician can heal people and physic(Soon to be mystic I like the name change) can talk to people. People usually find these enjoyable because they can see the impact they are having on the game. Court Wizard doesn’t seem to have a lot of effect. Except when you get a evil killed. Court Wizard needs a ability that A. Has a positive impact on the game and B. They can notice that impact
